item.title: #1 TP-Link AC750 Wifi Router
item.description: Improper handling of electronic components can lead to component destruction Here is my LinkedIn post related to this article : LinkedIn-Post What you need Here are all the tools you need to perform this kind of IoT Assessment on a device. For my part I didn’t have my soldering kit so I did it without but it was not very stable. Basic knowledge on UART ad IOT Hacking UART Bridge (Simple USB or Flipper Zero) Multimeter Cables Solder Iron (Optionnal) UART Device like Wifi Router UART ?
